name: Parkour of the Light
description:
In this game there is a guy made of light who is trying to do some parkour but he is bad at it.

You should protect him by using your cloud power.

Hold with the mouse to place the clouds, he will bounce on it. Try to be as precise as possible on the target to earn more points. Also try to use the least cloud possible because each remaining cloud will give you 1 point. And finally try to get the coins because they will give you 2 points each.

He is very weak so avoid the helicopter.

This game was made in 3 Days for the ScoreSpace Jam #19.

Everything was made by me , except the music wich was made by a friend. (Even the sound effects were made by me) I only used LootLocker for the leaderboard.

If you want a smoother version you can still download the game.
